Get Started



Why Host on Scapays?

So long as you own a free space, scrapays makes collection easier for you. Assembles a customized temporary structure that fits your space, assigns a collector to your space, you receive scheduled notification on amount of materials collected on your space and you get paid with respect to the volume of materials your space takes.
Collectors are trained and verified

Existing collectors are put through a semi structured
program and independent collectors are verified in
both cases certain information is required of them,
profiled, listed as our staff and liable to scrapays

List your space

Decide how long you want to host for

This ranges from as little as 3months to 3 years. Zero listing charge

We set up your
personal collection hub

collector

Get exclusive scrap listing
deals for investment

Being a collection vendor host comes with being in an exclusive community where material collection listings are offered for a return on investment.

Your Questions Answered At a Glance

Q. Who can be a Scrapays host?

It is easy to become a Scrapays host and it is always free to host. So long as you own an open space, could be a part of your parking space or a corner in your compound or a warehouse are just few places vendors have shared.

Q. Who is the collector that will be assigned to my space?

Because we are impacting lives. We use existing collectors 90% of the time. Scrapays have invested in their training, orientation and wellbeing before they are allocated to your space and while they are already assigned.

Q. Would these collected scrap material smell?

Absolutely not! They are materials that have already been presorted. A routine pickup as frequently as bi-weekly (dependent on the space) is also done to keep your space always neat. and No food waste is collected and stored in Vendors outlets.

Q. What protection do I have if part of my property is damaged?

Our Entire operations is insured and our vendor storage property has an insurance package already assigned to you.

Q. How do I get Paid?

Collection Payments are made every 30days after the initiation of your collection outlet. Investment returns are made on its due dates.
